DOC.brief_summary: This study aim compare therapeutic efficiency implant-secured removable partial denture ( PASI ) therapeutic efficiency metalic standard removable partial denture ( PAC ) treatment intermediate extended-gap ( 4 adjacent teeth ) . The therapeutic efficiency assess 5 years-prosthetic success rate .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation Implant-secured Removable Partial Denture
DOC.criteria: Patients least 4 6 adjacent teeth intermediate extendedgap ( exclude wisdom teeth ) upper low jaw . Patients least 4 conservable teeth dental arch , without major occlusal trouble . Patients healthy periodontium , allow metalic standard removable partial denture delivery : bleeding periodontal probe duration le 30 second , Osteolysis alveolar ridge less equal 50 % , attachment loss less equal 5mm Patients sufficient bone volume implant placement , without prior bone supply . Patients general counterindications implant placement . Patients suffer titanium allergy . Patients insufficient oral dental hygiene Patients smoke ten cigarette per day . Patients teeth extendedgap , could correct fixed toothsupported denture . Patient insufficient available bite level deliver attachment system ( < 7mm ) . Patients severe generalize chronic periodontitis , aggressive periodontitis periodontitis unresponsive treatment . Women report pregnant . Patients deprive liberty
